A '''breeze rod''' is an [[item]] obtained by killing [[breeze]]s. It can be used to craft [[wind charge]]s and [[mace]]s, duplicate [[flow armor trim]]s, and brew [[potion]]s of [[Wind Charging]].

=== Mob loot ===
{{Drop sources|Breeze Rod}}

== Usage ==
=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage}}

=== Repairing ===
Breeze rods can be used in an [[anvil]] to repair a [[mace]].
